src_original: evam ukte bhagavān yena gaṃgā nadī tena vyavalokayan vyavalokayati /  adrākṣīd bhagavān nadyā gaṃgāyāḥ srotasā mahāntaṃ dāruskandham uhyamānam* /
tgt_original: 漸至江水側。 爾時，世尊見江水中，有大材木為水所漂，即坐水側一樹下坐。

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca punas taṃ bhikṣum āmantrayate /
paśyasi tvaṃ bhikṣo nadyā gaṃgāyāḥ srotasā mahāntaṃ dāruskandham uhyamānam* (MSV I 49) /
tgt_original: 「汝等頗見木為水所漂乎？ 」諸比丘白佛言：

src_original: na sthale utpatsyati /  na manuṣyagrāhyo bhaviṣyati /  nāmanuṣyagrāhyaḥ /  nāvartagrāhyaḥ /  nāntaḥpūtībhāvaṃ gamiṣyati /  evam eṣa bhikṣo dāruskandho 'nupūrveṇa samudranimno bhaviṣyati samudrapravaṇaḥ samudraprāgbhāraḥ /
tgt_original: 「設當此木不著此岸，不著彼岸，又不中沒，復非在岸上，不為人所捉，復非為非人所捉者，復非為水所迴轉，復非腐敗者，便當漸漸至海。

src_original: cakraratnasya hastiratnasyāśvaratnasya maṇiratnasya strīratnasya gṛhapatiratnasya pariṇāyakaratnasya saptamasya /
tgt_original: 一者輪寶，二者象寶，三者馬寶，四者珠寶，五者女寶，六者主藏寶，七者典兵寶。 」佛語阿難：

src_original: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃrūpasya cakraratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /  iha bhagini rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tad eva poṣadhe paṃcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātopavāsair  alaṃkṛtasya upari prāsādatalagatasyāmātyagaṇaparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi cakraratnaṃ
tgt_original: 「此大天王為童子時八萬四千歲，作太子時八萬四千歲，登聖王位八萬四千歲。 」阿難問佛： 「云何為輪寶？

src_original: śubham akarmārakṛtaṃ divyaṃ sarvasauvarṇam* /  śubhaṃ cānena bhavati /  yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tad eva poṣadhe paṃcadaśyāṃ pūrvavad yāvat sarvasauvarṇam* /
tgt_original: 「月十五日，月盛滿時，王沐浴清淨，與婇女上東樓上，東向視，有千輻金輪。
